mapper.select: select account as account, password as password, name as name, hobbyid as hobbyid, sex as sex, photourl as photourl, nickname as nickname from user
select account as account, password as password, name as name, hobbyid as hobbyid, sex as sex, photourl as photourl, nickname as nickname from user where account = #{account}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( account, password, name, hobbyid, sex, photourl, nickname ) values ( #{account}, #{password}, #{name}, #{hobbyid}, #{sex}, #{photourl}, #{nickname} )
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, hobbyid = #{hobbyid}, sex = #{sex}, photourl = #{photourl}, nickname = #{nickname} where account = #{account}
